疈字的基本解释

疈
pì
古同“副”，剖，破开：“疈瓜抓枣。”

疈字的汉语字典释义

[①]［pì］
［《廣韻》芳逼切，入職，滂。］
［《集韻》拍逼切，入職，滂。］
(1)剖，剖开。
(2)指屠宰牲畜。

疈字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【田字部】　疈； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页767第04
【廣韻】芳逼切【集韻】拍逼切【正韻】必歷切，?音壁。磔牲也。【周禮·春官·大宗伯】以疈辜祭四方百物。【註】疈，牲胷也。疈而磔之。　又凡劈物使分析亦曰疈。【王維詩】簞食伊何，疈瓜抓棗。　又【集韻】芳六切，音蝮。又博厄切，音擘。義?同。

疈字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
疈字的起名意思

暂无。

Furuncle
Basic explanation of words
Furuncle
pì
Gu Tong's "Vice", cut, and broke open: "Fun melon grabs dates."
Furuncle
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［pì］
["Guang Yun" Fang is forced to cut, enter the post, punishing. ]
["Ji Yun" is very close, enters the post, and punishing. ]
(1) Cut, cut open.
(2) Refers to the slaughter of livestock.
Furuncle
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Won Collection 1] [Tian Zi Department] 　疈; Kangxi strokes: 20; Page number: Page 767 04
[Guang Yun] Fang forced to cut [Ji Yun] Pai forced to cut [Zheng Yun] must be cut,? Sound wall. The sacrifice is also. 【Zhou Li·Chun Official·Da Zong Bo】To sacrifice the Quartet and Hundred Things. [Note] Furuncle, animal corpse also. Succumb and succumb to it.　Furthermore, the analysis of cleavage is also called furuncle. [Wang Weishi] Eat Yihe, squash melons and grab dates.　 [Ji Yun] Fang six cuts, sound worm. Boheche again, Yin Biao. Righteous? Same.

Furuncle
Name meaning
Nothing.
pì, fù
гл.* разрезать; расчленять; разделять (напр. жертвенную тушу); разрезать грудную полость (жертвенного животного)
